scripts.build:clean: pnpm store prune && pnpm -r --sequential run clean
scripts.dev: pnpm build:packages && pnpx concurrently -n bot,server,scraper -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm -F @tg-discord/discord-bot dev" "pnpm -F @tg-discord/express-server dev" "pnpm -F @tg-discord/python-scraper dev"
scripts.dev:only:ts: pnpm build:packages && pnpx concurrently -n bot,server -c blue,green "pnpm -F @tg-discord/discord-bot dev" "pnpm -F @tg-discord/express-server dev"
scripts.dev:pm2: pnpm dev:kill-all && pnpm build:packages && pnpx pm2 start ecosystem.dev.config.cjs --no-daemon --log-date-format 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss Z'
scripts.dev:kill-all: pnpm dev:kill-pm2 && pnpm run kill-proc 'nodemon' 'tsgo' 'tsc' 'concurrently' 'python -u scrape.py' 'pm2' 'tsx'
scripts.dev:kill-pm2: pnpx pm2 kill && rm -f logs/*output.log && rm -f logs/*error.log
